answers.answer: Hello,The urge of frequent urination can be due to diabetes mellitus. Other possibilities are glomerulonephritis, pyelonephritis(inflammation of the kidneys),urinary tract infection, hypercalcemia, hypokalemia(low potassium),hyperthyroidism, hyperparathyroidism, diuretic drugs and pregnancy.In my opinion, investigations like kidney functions, blood sugar levels, ultrasound lower abdomen ,intravenous pyelography , pregnancy blood test, thyroid function tests and cystoscopy may be needed to confirm a diagnosis. I sincerely advise you to consult a urologist or nephrologist and get yourself evaluated so that a confirmatory diagnosis can be made. I’ll suggest consulting a urologist for the same and getting the uroflowmetry test done which actually tests the emptying of the urinary bladder.I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

question: hello, i have had this problem of frequent urge to urinate only when i am sitting down, it comes and go like every 30 minute.. if i felt the urge coming i usually stand up and take a walk to let the felling go, i've had blood test and urine test, but all the test come back fine with only high protein, calcium and stuff's, ufeme is clear with 6.5 ph. The situation is a few weeks ago i've had back pain because of the muscle injury, the doctor prescribe me with muscle relax drug and vitamin to rebuild the muscle and then few days after i  take the med the symptoms become worst i have to go to the bathroom like every 5 or 10 minutes, so i thought maybe it is side effects of the drug itself but ever since i have stop the med the urge is still there but the back pain had subsided and i am wondering could it be muscle injury tht causes these problem?
title: frequent urge to urinate, constant feeling of wet on penis
